name: Smashing Zombies 2: Whack Harder
description:
Smashing Zombies 2 is an arcade-y fun time that supports the Leap Motion Controller and Oculus Rift. Created for the Leap Motion 3d Game Jam!

USE WITH THE LEAP IN DESKTOP MODE

Don't have a Rift? We've got ya covered.

What are you waiting for? Go Whack it.
